indicator_available: International Labour Organisation (ILO) estimates based on country data compiled through the ILO Social Security Inquiry (SSI).
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 1.3
computation_definitions: The Social Security Inquiry (SSI) questionnaire has become the main comprehensive tool used to compile data on social protection coverage for children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims, and the poor and vulnerable.
source_other_info_1:
The Social Security Inquiry (SSI) is produced by Social Protection Department (SOCPRO) of the International Labour Office (ILO). SSI is a set of questionnaires and a database, which is the main source of global data on social protection, used daily by policy makers, officials of international organizations and researchers.

For the methodological manual and the SSI questionnaire please visit Social Protection.
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator.
